title: Clickup System Design Expert
job_overview:
WHO WE ARE
We are a boutique web design and marketing agency located in Canada, that are passionate about helping our clients grow their businesses online. We serve a wide range of clients including construction, plumbing, landscaping and home services and real estate.

WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR
We are looking for an experienced ClickUp Expert to help us make improvements to our Project Management System. This will mainly be around re-organization, template creation and automations.

RESPONSIBILITIES
Your job will be to use your past experience to:

- Extensive ClickUp knowledge
- Project Management and systems knowledge
- Experience working with Digital Marketing Agencies
- Knowledge of ZenPilot method is an asset
- ClickUp Certification is an asset

EMPLOYMENT TYPE
One-time gig work and we're not looking for an agency.

*Please add the words "Green Monkey" at the top of your application*.

Do NOT contact our business outside of this website, and apply only through onlinejobs.ph

Make sure to include samples of your work, proof of previous ad results and note relevant certifications.
